title: Thomas Bonney (priest)

sentences.sentence: Thomas Kaye Bonney(b Tansor, Northamptonshire, 20 June 1782 - d Normanton, Rutland 7 April 1863) was Archdeacon of Leicester from 22 January 1831 until his death
The son of Henry Kaye Bonney, Rector of Kings Cliffe, Northamptonshire, he was educated at Clare College, Cambridge
He was ordained in 1807. He held incumbencies at Coningsby, Lincolnshire, and Normanton, Rutland

main_sentence_from_spike: The son of Henry Kaye Bonney , Archdeacon of Bedford from 1821 to 1845 , he was educated at Clare College , Cambridge .
